description:
Quick Apply Full-time 1 hour ago Full Job Description Collective Influence is an industry leader in mastermind networking, small business development, and tax-free retirement education.
It is changing the way small businesses perceive financial success by helping them break the bonds as financial contributors to becoming financial creators.
Our company is seeking an experienced Sponsorship Sales Manager to join our growing organization.
The ideal candidate will:
Find, pitch, sell and secure sponsorship opportunities for our Aspire Tour Events Develop, refine and maintain a pipeline of client relationships Research prospects and industries Generate and arrange meetings with brands through networking, cold calling and other methods of canvassing Develop detailed sponsorship decks with activation ideas and concepts for brands Pitch sponsorship and marketing partnerships Collaborate with internal departments to discover opportunities and advise how to maximize relationships.
Salary will be based on experience.
Business to Business sales experience preferred Job Type:
Full-time
Benefits:
401(k) Dental insurance Flexible spending account Health insurance Paid time off Paid training Vision insurance Schedule:
Monday to Friday Weekend availability Supplemental pay types:
Bonus pay Commission pay Ability to commute/relocate:
Ponte Vedra, FL 32081:
Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) License/Certification:
Driver's License (Required) Willingness to travel:
25% (Required) Work Location:
One location Quick Apply.
Estimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.
